description.effect.heal: Heals living entities and damages undead.
description.effect.harm: Damages living entities and heals undead.
description.effect.jump: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage.
description.effect.fireResistance: Grants immunity to fire and lava.
description.effect.waterBreathing: Grants the ability to breathe underwater.
description.effect.blindness: Reduces viewing range and prevents the player from sprinting and dealing critical hits.
description.effect.nightVision: Allows to see in the dark.
description.effect.poison: Deals damage over time. Does not affect undead.
description.effect.glowing: Outlines entities, making them visible through blocks.
description.effect.luck: Can increase the quality and quantity of loot.
description.effect.unluck: Can decrease the quality and quantity of loot.
description.bewitchment.absence: Clears all potion effects, both positive and negative.
description.bewitchment.iceworld: Transforms landscape into a winter wonderland. Creates perpetual ice, which doesn't melt.
description.bewitchment.rubedo: Turns sand and colored blocks red.
description.bewitchment.citrinitas: Turns sand and colored blocks yellow.
description.bewitchment.desertification: Turns plants into their desert counterparts.
description.bewitchment.fertility: Causes plants to grow and animals to breed.
description.bewitchment.harvest: Instantly harvests and replants seeds. May cause leaves to drop apples and pumpkins to grow.
description.bewitchment.spore_cloud: Causes mushrooms, mycelium, moss and ferns to grow.
description.bewitchment.blight: Kills plants and crops. Weakens creatures.
description.bewitchment.ruin: Causes blocks to decay or break down.
description.bewitchment.arachnophobia: Wraps the target in cobwebs and summons spiders around them.
description.bewitchment.mending: Grows grass on dirt and mycelium. Cures zombie villagers.
description.bewitchment.sleeping: Blinds and slows the target. Can kill if they have low health.
description.bewitchment.shell_armor: Reflects some of the damage back to the attacker.
description.bewitchment.disrobing: Takes armor and baubles off the target.
description.bewitchment.cursed_leaps: Launches the target into the air.
description.botania.potion.soulCross: Restores health upon slaying any other creature.
description.botania.potion.emptiness: Prevents mob spawning in a 128 block radius.
description.botania.potion.bloodthirst: Allows mobs to spawn regardless of normal conditions within 64 blocks.
description.botania.potion.allure: Doubles the speed of catching fish and fishing loot.
description.botania.potion.clear: Clears all potion effects, both positive and negative.
description.charm.potion.coffee.name: Gives Speed, Haste and Strength for a short time.
description.charm.potion.decay.name: Deals damage over time.
description.charm.potion.ender_sight.nam: Allows to locate the stronghold and attracts endermen.
description.naturalpledge.potion.immorta: Grants resistance to most forms of damage.
description.mob_effect.netherex:frozen: Prevents the target from using items and attacking. Mobs are also prevented from moving.
description.mob_effect.netherex:infested: Causes spores to spawn around the target.
description.mob_effect.netherex:crying: Causes ghastlings to spawn around the target (only in the Nether). Also used to summon Ghast Queen.
description.potion.effect.mysticalwildli: Causes animals to breed when possible and reduces breeding cooldown.
description.effect.burst: Creates an explosion that doesn't damage the target and surrounding blocks.
description.effect.recoil: Reflects some of the damage back to the attacker.
description.effect.drown: Makes the target only breath underwater.
description.effect.slow_fall: Reduces falling speed and fall damage.
description.effect.launch: Launches the target into the air.
description.effect.repair: Repairs target's equipped and held items.
description.effect.rust: Damages target's equipped and held items. Gold is not affected.
description.effect.extension: Extends the duration of one random effect per level.
description.effect.bless: Gives a random positive potion effect.
description.effect.curse: Gives a random negative potion effect.
description.effect.teleport: Teleports the target to a random nearby location.
description.effect.teleport_surface: Teleports the target to the surface.
description.effect.teleport_spawn: Teleports you to the spawn after standing still for 10 seconds.
description.effect.revival: Revives the target with 2 hearts per level on death.
description.potion.railcraft.creosote: Deals damage over time to arthropods.
description.rpsideas.potion.psishock: Drains psionic energy from the target.
description.xreliquary.potion.cure: Cures zombie villagers. Higher levers work faster.
description.effect.blazing_trail: Leaves a trail of fire behind the target.
description.effect.feather: Reduces falling speed and negates fall damage.
description.quark.potion.resilience.name: Increases knockback resistance.
description.quark.potion.danger_sight.na: Highlights spots where hostile mobs can spawn.
